docblock.description: Function is used tovalidate a email

tag.name: param
tag.description: Check or not if the domain exists

docblock.description: Function is used to validate a string using the given format 'format'

tag.name: param
tag.description: Options array where: 'format' is the format of the string Ex: VALIDATE_NUM . VALIDATE_ALPHA (see constants) 'min_length' minimum length 'max_length' maximum length

docblock.description: FUnction is used to validate a URL

tag.name: param
tag.description: Check or not if the domain exists

docblock.description: Validate a number according to Luhn check algorithm
docblock.long-description:
This function checks given number according Luhn check algorithm. It is published on several places, also here:

 http://www.webopedia.com/TERM/L/Luhn_formula.html
 http://www.merriampark.com/anatomycc.htm
 http://hysteria.sk/prielom/prielom-12.html#3 (Slovak language)
 http://www.speech.cs.cmu.edu/~sburke/pub/luhn_lib.html (Perl lib)

tag.name: return
tag.description: true if number is valid, otherwise false

docblock.description: Validate date and times.
docblock.long-description: Note that this method need the Date_Calc class

tag.name: param
tag.description: array options where : 'format' The format of the date (%d-%m-%Y) 'min' The date has to be greater than this array($day, $month, $year) 'max' The date has to be smaller than this array($day, $month, $year)

docblock.description: Validate a ISBN number
docblock.long-description: This function checks given number according

tag.name: param
tag.description: number (only numeric chars will be considered)

tag.name: return
tag.description: true if number is valid, otherwise false

tag.name: param
tag.description: Contains the validation type and all parameters used in. 'val_type' is not optional others validations properties must have the same name as the function parameters. Ex: array('toto'=>array('type'=>'string','format'='toto@thing.info','min_length'=>5));

tag.name: param
tag.description: if set, the elements not listed in data will be removed
